text:
@WHO @pahowho @WHO_Europe @WHOEMRO @WHOAFRO @WHOSEARO @WHOWPRO I guess this is the difference between biochemical studies & in-vivo ones. 
Diseases don't read textbooks. The ACE theory makes sense, but if not observed in practice, a pinch of salt is needed
